body:
# My portfolio

My name is [Brian Hoffman](http://twitter.com/brian_c_hoffman)

* [Mindfulness in Plain English](http://www.urbandharma.org/pdf2/Mindfulness%20in%20Plain%20English%20Book%20Preview.pdf)  - great free read on how to get the analytical thinkers and busy minds into the meditation game today

* [Album of my DIY Ergonomic Workstation](http://imgur.com/a/BopF7) - A lower-back injury required a serious look into workspace ergonomics

* [What should I read next?](http://www.whatshouldireadnext.com/index.php) - This site tells you what books to read based on what books you like

A picture of Brian and Tiffany

![alt text](http://i.imgur.com/Kb4hWpX.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
